page.title: 17A SCHOOLDAY IN FLEETWOOD
page.content: On a Monday morning, as on every other school day, I wake up at 6.30 a.m. I go downstairs for my breakfast: cornflakes followed by toast. I then wash and get dressed for school. My uniform is a royal blue skirt with a pale blue shirt and a cherry red jumper. Also part of my uniform is a black tie diagonally striped with gold cherry and blue. My mother gives me money with which to buy my lunch. I then go to school, Cardinal Allen. The schoolday starts at{9.00a.m.}First I go to registration, and at{9.10a.m. a bell rings to indicate the start of period 1. There are{9 periods}to a schoolday, and on a Monday the subjects I study in those periods are Maths, English, Science and R.E. At{3.30p.m.,}the final bell rings and the schoolday is ended.
